title: Message Congratulating General de Gaulle on the Results of the Referendum on the French Constitution.
text:
Dear Mr. President:

As an old friend of France, I extend my personal congratulations to you on the outcome of the referendum on the new French Constitution. To me the decisive result recorded by yesterday's voting is not only an outstanding success for yourself but also a most inspiring development for France. The outcome is greatly encouraging to France's friends throughout the world. for me it demonstrates the determination of the french people to build anew for the future.

Please accept, General, my heartfelt congratulations and best personal wishes. Sincerely,

DWIGHT D. EISENHOWER

General Charles de Gaulle President of the Council of Ministers Republic of France
